title: Warcraft.II.2.FULL.DOSgame-VREALQRELEASE
description:
------------------VIRTUAL REALITY STUDIOS QUALITY RELEASES-----------------

- Source: Multiple sources.
- Modified and Cracked by: LoveWarez (aka. xstrem)
(This game is cracked! No need for no-CD patches, as other releases required. Thanks to the cracker, this issue is now history.)
- Released by: LoveWarez.
- Uploaded by: LoveWarez.


Welcome to another VREAL QUALITY RELEASE.

Quality releases are tested and viruscanned to ensure you optimal experience! This is not free... It costs a big and nice THANKS!
Well, not really, but it is appreciated. (Also, remember to SEED!)

Warcract II is a classic RTS game - even though it&#039;s old, it&#039;s still very amusing! Especially if you have memories from old times, back when you played this game.

---------------------

Here are instructions. Be sure to follow them 100% in order for it to work properly:

1. 
You&#039;ll need DOSBox in order for this to work (Not included) - HOWEVER you can run this off Windows XP (is tested), but it will lagg (both picture and sound) nomatter how fast your computer is. So DOSbox is highly recommended.
DOSBox is required to work with Vista. 

Download the latest release of DosBox here:
www.dosbox.com 

2.
If you don&#039;t like consoles, then download a nice DOSBox GUI from here:

3.
However, if you don&#039;t like to configure all this, VREAL has released an already modified and installed version of DOSBox with the D.O.G included which will run out of the box. (For optimal user-friendlyness, yes, Vreal is your best source.).
But of course, in a couple of years (it&#039;s 2008 today) the DOSBox version will be outdated. Therefore, it&#039;s recommended to download a fresh install and configure it yourself. 
If you want the Vreal Version - Search for: "DOSbox.GUI.Modified.and.ready2use.VREALQRELEASE" on the same torrentsite you found this one and extract it to your installationfolder.

4. 
Now, unrar the whole .RAR file to anywhere you want - it doesn&#039;t need any installation.

5. 
Run the file: "war2.exe" through DOSBox or the D.O.G GUI. 

6. 
ENJOY! AND SEED!
